sentences: Ma kasutan oma nutitelefoniga sageli Google'i otsingut.
Kasutage palun seda vormi oma kommentaaride sisestamiseks.
context: The Estonian word 'kasutada' is a verb that means to use, utilize, or employ something. It's an infinitive form (dictionary form) and can be conjugated in various tenses: kasutan (I use), kasutad (you use), kasutab (he/she/it uses), kasutame (we use), kasutate (you [plural/formal] use), kasutavad (they use). The word is commonly used to indicate the utilization of objects, services, tools, information, or abstract concepts in everyday and professional contexts.
